name: Bone Dust
description: Fine powder ground from the bones of cursed creatures. It feels cold and seems to absorb light around it. Required for casting Bane spells.
ai_description: pale white bone powder with dark shadows, cursed dust that absorbs light and radiates cold energy
notes: Used for necromancy and summoning magic
Unlimited when Totem focus is equipped
Consumed on use if no Totem focus
